text: this was a fantastic place to stay for a few days for a couple while exploring Austin. its conveniently located to the East 6th St strip of bars and restaurants and an easy car trip downtown or down to South Congress. the apartment itself was impeccably styled, very clean, and exactly as pictured and described. roman and andrea were extremely responsive, helpful, and unobtrusive as hosts. overall, an amazing value and would highly recommend.
title: Private Studio in Modern Crash Pad
